Title: The Pen
Plot: Elaine regrets accompanying Jerry on a trip to Florida to visit his parents. There are temperature control problems in the condo, a back breaking sofa bed, a slight overdose of muscle relaxants and the disposition of a pen that writes upside down.
GuestStars: Larry David, Barney Martin, Liz Sheridan, Len Lesser, Annie Korzen, Sandy Baron, Ann Morgan Guilbert, Magda Harout, Tucker Smallwood, Roger Nolan
